I stopped keeping this site up-to-date many years ago, so if you've ended up here I'm afraid there's nothing to see any more.

Other Halesowen Town websites:

  • Unofficial Halesowen Town Forum
  • Fantasy Island
  • Official HTFC site

For the sake of posterity here are the news stories that appeared from 1997 to 2006...

  • Index of new stories

 

 

20 Dec 1997

News Story

Yeltz 2 Hastings 1

Once again we left it late to clinch the points - coming from behind to beat Hastings 2-1 with a Steve Piearce goal and an 88th minute poke-in from Ada Cooper at a fog-bound Grove. We had loads of chances, but their keeper made some excellent saves.

 

 

13 Dec 1997

News Story

Rothwell 1 Yeltz 1

Another away draw at Rothwell 1-1. We can say we're definitely better at home than away this season! Our league record so far is now:

We're still in 3rd place. Merthyr finally let a goal in but they beat Crawley 2-1 and are now 9 points above us with a game in hand.

 

 

06 Dec 1997

News Story

Yeltz 2 Dorchester 1

The Yeltz march up the table (we're now 3rd) continues with a 2-1 win over Dorchester. Evran got the first just after half-time, and we we're looking in command until Dorchester got a shock equalizer in the 87th minute. However Snapper saved the day by poking in the winner in injury time. Phew!

 

 

03 Dec 1997

News Story

BSC Yeltz 0 Villa 0

0-0 against Villa in the B'ham Senior Cup. Wow.

 

 

29 Nov 1997

News Story

FAT Yeltz 1 Burton 2

A disappointing 2-1 loss to fellow DML Premier team Burton means another year will go by without The Yeltz playing at our second-home Wembley. Evran got our goal.

 

 

25 Nov 1997

News Story

Yeltz 4 Salisbury 1

A hat-trick from Evran Wright helps The Yeltz beat Salisbury 4-1 at The Grove. We're now 5th, our highest position for a couple of months.

 

 

22 Nov 1997

News Story

Tamworth 0 Yeltz 2

We finally break our duck away form home with a 2-0 AWAY victory against Tamworth. The goals were from Luke Yates and new bloke Ian Reed.

 

 

18 Nov 1997

News Story

Yeltz 1 Burton 1

A first league draw at home: 1-1 against Burton with our scorer Mr Own Goal. We're stuck in 10th.

 

 

15 Nov 1997

News Story

Yeltz 3 Forest Green 0

Another good HOME performance - a 3-0 win against Forest Green.The goals came from Piearce and a couple from Evran in a brilliant display of attacking football.

 

 

08 Nov 1997

News Story

Gloucester 1 Yeltz 0

At least it wasn't 0-0. Another poor away result - a 1-0 defeat vs. Gloucester. Not much to say really, except our abysmal away record is now:

P W D L F A Pts
8 0 5 3 2 6  5

 

 

04 Nov 1997

News Story

Atherstone 0 Yeltz 0

Yet another 0-0 draw away from home - this time against Atherstone. We still haven't won away in the league this season and are only 10th in the table.

 

 

01 Nov 1997

News Story

Yeltz 3 Sittingbourne 1

A 3-1 win at home to Sittingbourne and we're back onto the first page of the table on Ceefax. Oh joy! Evran's back as well.

 

 

28 Oct 1997

News Story

DMC Yeltz 0 Bilston 0

And another's gone. We could only draw 0-0 against Bilston in the League Cup 1st Round 2nd leg, so we're out 3-1 on aggregate. Oh dear.

 

 

25 Oct 1997

News Story

FAC Yeltz 0 Northwich 2

It's all over. A 2-0 loss at home to Northwich is no disgrace, but it was another disappointing Yeltz performance. We had much of the play but never really looked like scoring, and Northwich fully deserved their victory.

 

 

17 Oct 1997

News Story

Matt Clarke is sold to Kidderminster for a welcome Â£10,000 plus more following appearances. It's a shame to see him go, but that's a good deal for us.

 

 

14 Oct 1997

News Story

FAC Redditch 0 Yeltz 3

Our epic cup run staggers on with a 3-0 victory over Redditch in the replay. Goals from Bradley, Crisp and Piearce means we'll play Northwich in the 4th Qualifying Round tie, the farthest we've been for several years.

 

 

11 Oct 1997

News Story

FAC Yeltz 2 Redditch 2

Halesowen leave it late to force a 2-2 draw against Redditch in the FA Cup 3rd Qualifying Round. On a very wet day, we were twice behind before Matt Gardiner forced the ball home in the last five minutes.

 

 

07 Oct 1997

News Story

DMC Bilston 3 Yeltz 1

Halesowen Old Boys - otherwise known as Bilston - 3 Yeltz 1. Two goals from Evran Wright and one from Malcolm Hazlewood meant Halesowen suffered yet another away defeat in this Doc Martens Cup First round First Leg tie. Steve Piearce got our goal.

 

 

04 Oct 1997

News Story

Merthyr 2 Yeltz 1

Another disappointing away performance, this time a 2-1 defeat at Merthyr - Yeltz goal from Bradder. Top of the table Forest Green drew 2-2 at second place Crawley in front of 2,163!

 

 

30 Sep 1997

News Story

FAC Yeltz 4 Rothwell 1

The Yeltz march on in the FA Cup, winning the replay against Rothwell 4-1 after extra time. It was 1-1 at full-time, Halesowen having taken the lead through Kevin Harrison. However Rothwell had their goalie sent off, and by the end were down to 9 men. Goals from Gardiner, Piearce and Yates means we go through to a home tie against Redditch.

Newer Older
